pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vocab=====.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/vocab/badge/?version=latest :target: http://vocab.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest :alt: Documentation Status.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/vzhong/vocab.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/vzhong/vocabVocab is a python package that provides vocabulary objects for natural language processing.Installation------------.. code-block:: sh pip install vocab pip install git+https://github.com/vzhong/vocab.gitUsage-----.. code-block:: python >>> from vocab import Vocab, UnkVocab >>> v = Vocab() >>> v.word2index('hello', train=True) 0 >>> v.word2index(['hello', 'world'], train=True) [0, 1] >>> v.index2word([1, 0]) ['world', 'hello'] >>> v.index2word(1) 'world' >>> small = v.prune_by_count(2) >>> small.to_dict() {'counts': {'hello': 2}, 'index2word': ['hello']} >>> u = UnkVocab() >>> u.word2index(['hello', 'world'], train=True) [1, 2] >>> u.word2index('hello friend !'.split()) [1, 0, 0] >>> u.index2word(0) '<unk>'
